review: Extreme diarrhea, bloating, then gastritis.Second time:Extreme dizziness, headaches, neck pain, vaginal herpes, mouth sores.This antibiotic should be taken off the market.I also have purple bruising on my body.

Vantin (cefpodoxime):On my fourth pill of Vantin in a few more hours and I couldn't believe the rapidity of the healing! I am taking for Klebsiella Pneumoniae along with Macrobid for Enterro Bacteria! I have had dry mouth, dry throat, increased thirst.. slight ringing in ears that has passed.. headache ugh was the worst so far.. but not horrible. Heavier menstrual period a little dizziness and hey! I'm penicillin allergic. So I think I'm doing A-1.
Vantin (cefpodoxime):This antibiotic worked really fast with no side effects for me.
